patthana22.16:4.1: Nakusalaṃ nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.16:5.1: Nakusalaṃ naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.16:5.2: Naabyākataṃ naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.16:5.3: Nakusalaṃ naaraṇañca naabyākataṃ naaraṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.16:5.5: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
